verses.name: 2 Kings 16:4
verses.text: And he sacrificed and burnt incense in the high places, and on the hills, and under every green tree.

verses.name: 2 Kings 16:5
verses.text: Then Rezin king of Syria and Pekah son of Remaliah king of Israel came up to Jerusalem to war: and they besieged Ahaz, but could not overcome him.

verses.name: 2 Kings 16:6
verses.text: At that time Rezin king of Syria recovered Elath to Syria, and drave the Jews from Elath: and the Syrians came to Elath, and dwelt there unto this day.
